Creating a Shell Script

a2_shell_script.Rmd

Introduction 

.
├── data
│   └── swiss.csv
├── out
├── report.qmd
└── src
    ├── fig_fitted.R
    ├── model.R
    ├── scaled.R
    ├── tab_coef.R
    ├── tab_fitted.R
    └── vals_fitted.R


suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(MASS)
  library(command)
})

cmd_assign(.scaled = "out/scaled.rds",
           method = "M",
           .out = "out/model.rds")

scaled <- readRDS(.scaled)

model <- rlm(fertility ~ agriculture + infant_mort, 
             data = scaled,
             method = method)

saveRDS(model, file = .out)
cmd_shell("src/model.R")
Rscript src/model.R \
  out/scaled.rds \
  out/model.rds \
  --method=M
cmd_shell("src/fig_fitted.R")
Rscript src/fig_fitted.R \
  out/vals_fitted.rds \
  out/fig_fitted.png

We call 

shell_script("src")
.
├── data
│   └── swiss.csv
├── out
├── report.qmd
├── src
│   ├── fig_fitted.R
│   ├── model.R
│   ├── scaled.R
│   ├── tab_coef.R
│   ├── tab_fitted.R
│   └── vals_fitted.R
└── workflow.sh


Rscript src/fig_fitted.R \
  out/vals_fitted.rds \
  out/fig_fitted.png

Rscript src/model.R \
  out/scaled.rds \
  out/model.rds \
  --method=M

Rscript src/scaled.R \
  data/swiss.csv \
  out/scaled.rds

Rscript src/tab_coef.R \
  out/model.rds \
  out/tab_coef.rds

Rscript src/tab_fitted.R \
  out/vals_fitted.rds \
  out/tab_fitted.csv \
  --digits=2

Rscript src/vals_fitted.R \
  out/scaled.rds \
  out/model.rds \
  out/vals_fitted.rds

Rscript src/scaled.R \
  data/swiss.csv \
  out/scaled.rds

Rscript src/model.R \
  out/scaled.rds \
  out/model.rds \
  --method=M

Rscript src/tab_coef.R \
  out/model.rds \
  out/tab_coef.rds

Rscript src/vals_fitted.R \
  out/scaled.rds \
  out/model.rds \
  out/vals_fitted.rds

Rscript src/fig_fitted.R \
  out/vals_fitted.rds \
  out/fig_fitted.png

Rscript src/tab_fitted.R \
  out/vals_fitted.rds \
  out/tab_fitted.csv \
  --digits=2

Rscript -e "quarto::quarto_render('report.qmd')"
